text: Ek martaba woh unke saath kooch (marching) kar raha tha) yahan tak ke jab yeh sab chuntiyon (ants) ki waadi(valley) mein pahunchey to ek chunti (ant) ne kaha “ Aey chunityon , Apne bilon (holes) mein ghuss jao, kahin aisa na ho ke Sulaiman aur uske lashkar tumhein kuchal daalein aur unhein khabar bhi na ho”
